translations.text: May the hands of Abi Lahab<sup foot_note="81502">1</sup>be ruined, and may he be ruined!
His wealth did<sup foot_note="81503">1</sup>not avail him, nor did what he earned.
He will roast in a flaming fire,
while his wife1, that firewood carrier2 —
around her neck is a rope of palm fiber.
